gate.util

Class GateException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • gate.util.GateException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentFormatException, ExecutionException, GazetteerException, InvalidFormatException, InvalidOffsetException, InvalidValueException, JapeException, ParameterException, PersistenceException, ResourceInstantiationException, TokeniserException, WordNetException

    public class GateException
extends Exception
    A superclass for exceptions in the GATE packages. Can be used to catch any internal exception thrown by the GATE libraries. (Of course other types of exception may be thrown, but these will be from other sources such as the Java core API.)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
